title: Water Leakage Repair
description: AC water leakage is a common problem faced by many homeowners and should be repaired immediately to avoid wall damage, electrical issues, and unhealthy indoor conditions. Proper AC water leakage repair ensures smooth operation and maintains comfort inside the home. At Ash Enterprises, water leakage problems are handled through a careful and professional repair process.
process: Initial inspection to identify leakage source
Clean blocked drainage pipes if needed
Test water flow and ensure proper drainage

title: Ac Gas Refilling
description: Gas Filling 1 Ton Ac. Professional AC gas refilling service to restore cooling performance. Our certified technicians use genuine refrigerant and follow proper procedures to ensure optimal AC performance and energy efficiency.
process: Identify any leaks in the system
recommendedFrequency: Once every 1-2 years or when cooling reduces

title: AC Foam Wash
description: AC foam wash is an advanced and effective cleaning method that helps restore the cooling performance and hygiene of an air conditioner. Over time, dust, grease, bacteria, and mold accumulate on the AC's internal components, reducing efficiency and affecting indoor air quality. At Ash Enterprises, AC foam wash is performed using professional-grade chemicals and proper safety procedures.
process: Remove AC filters and clean separately
Let foam penetrate and dissolve dirt

title: AC Jet Wash Service
description: Regular AC servicing is one of the smartest ways to keep your cooling system running efficiently, especially in today's climate where temperatures rise quickly and air conditioners work overtime. Many people assume an AC only needs attention when it stops cooling, but the truth is that time-to-time servicing can prevent major breakdowns, reduce electricity bills, and keep indoor air healthy. Our AC servicing solutions are designed to give you complete peace of mind, ensuring your machine performs at its best throughout the year.

title: Ac Repair Inspection
description: The inspection begins with understanding the concerns, such as low cooling, unusual noise, water leakage, or high electricity consumption. This helps our technician focus on specific problem areas. At Ash Enterprises, air conditioner inspection at home Or Office is carried out through a systematic and professional process to ensure efficient cooling, safety, and long-lasting performance.
process: Identify issues and provide detailed report
recommendedFrequency: When AC shows issues or annually

title: Split Ac Installation
description: Split AC installation is a technical process that requires proper planning, skilled workmanship, and safety precautions to ensure efficient cooling and long-term performance. At Ash Enterprises, split AC installation is carried out professionally, following standard guidelines and manufacturer recommendations.
process: Install outdoor unit on stand or wall
